Uses of Interface
de.mrapp.android.validation.Validateable

  • Packages that use Validateable 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.validation  

    • Uses of Validateable in de.mrapp.android.validation

      Classes in de.mrapp.android.validation that implement Validateable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractValidateableView<ViewType extends View,ValueType>
      An abstract base class for all views, whose value should be able to be validated according to the pattern, which is suggested by the Material Design guidelines.
      class  EditText
      A view, which allows to enter text.
      class  PasswordEditText
      A view, which allows to enter a password.
      class  Spinner
      A view, which allows to choose a value from a drop down menu.
      Methods in de.mrapp.android.validation with parameters of type Validateable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ValidationListener.onValidationFailure(Validateable<Type> view, Validator<Type> validator)
      The method, which is invoked, when a validation failed.
      void ValidationListener.onValidationSuccess(Validateable<Type> view)
      The method, which is invoked, when a validation succeeded.
